profileText: a Representative from New York; born in Jamestown, Chautauqua County, N.Y., February 27, 1981; graduated from Pine Valley Central School, South Dayton, N.Y., 1999; B.A., Niagara University, Lewiston, N.Y., 2003; political consultant; staff, United States Representative Thomas M. Reynolds of New York, 2003-2007; staff, United States Representative Christopher John Lee of New York, 2009-2010; chair, Erie County Republican Party, 2010-2019; staff, transition team for President-elect Donald J. Trump, 2016-2017; chair, New York republican state committee, 2019-2023; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress (January 3, 2023-present).
